casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Lyons, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Lyons (1998), 84 Ohio St.3d 45.]

(No. 98-1396 Submitted October 13, 1998 Decided December 2, 1998.) *46Kevin J. Baxter, Erie County Prosecuting Attorney, and Mary Ann Barylski, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on the authority of State v. Cook (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 404, 700 N.E.2d 570.

The trial court’s finding that Scott Lyons is a sexually oriented offender is reinstated.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
